item.description:
McFadden's has kindly invited us to their Trivia night and to sweeten the pot will be sending some appetizers our way when we get there.

Gather at 7pm for socializing, drinks and food, the trivia game starts at 8 and runs until 10pm. Stick around for the game, its amazing what most of us don't realize we know about music, movies, television, current events, history, geography, science and many other topics.

No maybe's accepted, as I need to give McFadden's an accurate head count for reserving tables and appetizers.
item.how_to_find_us: we should have some reserved tables for us, look for me and a meetup sign
item.name: Drinks, Appetizers and Trivia @ McFaddens
